name: Witch Zoe - Hentai Shuffle
description:
During her training to be a powerful sorcerer Zoe met Elliot, a young mercenary who is becoming very rich serving all kinds of clients.

Known by the Evil Guilds as the fearless guy, the Demon Lord has decided to end with him once and for all.

Zoe watches Elliot's brutal kidnap and now it's up to her to save the life of a man who she believes to be the love of her life.

Features

  • Storytelling game mixed with shuffle and platforms mechanics;
  • Brain puzzles;
  • Atmospheric Music;
  • 65 Levels;
  • Steam Achievements;
